There is also a very nice park with animals nearby, about a 5 or 10 minute walk away. No emptying services nearby but with bus stop, garbage cans, court and skate park attached.

title: (35300) Santa Brígida - 31 Calle Gonzalo Medina

title: (35018) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - 73 Calle Casas de Abajo
title_short: (35018) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - 73 Calle Casas de Abajo
description: Parking lot without services- located below the large parking lot for the stadium. Pitch is level and paved, space for 3-4 RVs. We had no problems with 6.5m, suitable for larger motorhomes. Good accessibility. Relatively quiet, we stayed here for one night after crossing the island by ferry. Nice park nearby.

title: (35211) Cazadores -
description: A small, unofficial parking lot on 2 levels. Upper level can be driven on without 4x4 (1-2 relatively level spots), 4x4 and a lot of ground clearance required for the lower level. The approach here is very narrow and steep. Here again 2-3 relatively straight places. No service at all, please watch your rubbish! No officially designated parking space, but also no prohibition. Surrounded by pine trees, right on the GC-130, not far from the Pico de las Nieves. Didn't stay here, just stopped. But I can imagine that you can stand here overnight.

name: Camping Playa de Vargas
title: (35269) Camping Playa de Vargas
description: Location with a lot of wind, noise from planes (near the airport). It does not support caravan / camper / motorhome installations (these must be approved). Sanitary passables, nothing extraordinary. There is a restaurant that usually has celebrations and so a lot of noise. At the entrance, they have no control when opening and closing the gate, just as they asked me where we were going. I will not come back !! I prefer other places and gratuis!

title: (35216) Cazadores - GC-130
description: Parking lot on the road next to a point of view. We spend two nights here without problems. Windy area!

title: (35018) Las Palmas - 80 Calle Jericó
description: Hardware store with sale of gas cartridges and cylinders. They come in various sizes, including the model 907 blue cylinder from Campigaz or Butsir. They also have electricity and plumbing material and the guy is very very nice and pleasant. He helped me with several questions about a faucet part for the van.  Hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. Saturdays: 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.

title: (35329) Hoya del Gamonal - Unnamed Road
description: A very narrow path in the middle of the shrubs (do not be too afraid of scratches on the vehicle). At the end of it a dead end and a small esplanade near an electric pole. absolute tranquility and magnificent view.

title_short: (35003) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - 2 Avenida Alcalde José Ramirez Bethencourt
description: Very quiet park to sleep. Many trees and not much noise. Very quiet area. During the day the parking lots are paid

title: (35269) Agüimes - 27 Calle Eden Playa Vargas
description: The car park is located in a protected area with time restrictions for circulation. Camping in the surroundings is not allowed. There is a camping nearby. (the area is usually windy). LENGTH: 1,300 meters WIDTH: 15 meters COASTAL FACADE: Urban SAND: Bolos ACCESS METHOD: Car PARKING: No BUS: Yes / Interurban, Las Palmas Line HOSPITAL: Insular University Hospital of Las Palmas 24 km. NUDISM: NO TOILETS: NO SHOWERS OR WASHBASINS: NO BINS: NO RESTORATION: NO RENTAL SUNBEDS / UMBRELLA: NO SPORTS AREA: NO CHILDREN'S ZONE: NO RENTAL OR NAUTICAL CLUB: NO DIVING PRACTICE: NO

title: (35011) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - 98 Avenida Escaleritas
title_short: (35011) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - 98 Avenida Escaleritas
description: Self-service laundry, washing and drying . Open 365 days a year, from 07:30 to 22:30.

title: (35269) Agüimes - GC-2-6
description: This place is within a protected space and circulation is restricted from 8:00 to 20:00 just at the entrance there is a sign that warns and informs of the limitations and the possible cost of sanctions for not complying restricted circulation hours. the track is dirt there is some section a little booed but in general the state of the road is fine. Normally the area is windy, in this area a surfer usually meets to practice Winsurf, other users park their vehicles in the area to access the beach that is next to it called Cuervo Grande also known as the beach of the three peos, in the Beach is allowed to go with animals normally you will find it full of dogs with their owners. In general, spending the day here if the day is a good option. If you want to spend the night, I imagine you can do it without problems outside the protected area with time restrictions, standing somewhere discreet and properly parked to avoid legal problems. (I recommend you inform yourself well to prevent), in any case if you want to be calmer for the night there is a camping nearby if you wish.

title: (35328) Utiaca - Lugar Utiaca
description: Trankilo drinking water site and restaurant very close to the city of San Mateo

description: Self-service laundry in Cruce de Arinaga.

title: (35270) Temisas -
description: It is a small path off the GC 550. Very quiet at night as the road is hardly busy. Buses and trucks also drive by during the day, but you hardly hear them. The view of the valley and the mountains is very nice. At night you can see the stars very well here, as there is little light in the area. From Agüimes the path is on the right hand side and is a bit difficult to access (larger rocks - 4WD is not essential). The parking space is not completely flat, but with a slight incline.

title: (35329) Vega de San Mateo - GC-130
description: Small parking space on the street. But can continue into the forest. Fantastic view !!

title: (35329) Vega de San Mateo - GC-130
description: A spectacular area to spend the night surrounded by nature and easily accessible. Only parking and sleeping, there is no emptying or filling service. The sky is usually clear most of the days of the year.

title: (35329) Vega de San Mateo - GC-130
description: This place is an official campgournd « llanos de salado ». Beautiful Forrest with pine trees, a lot of vans come during the weekend for picnic. It is allowed to stay overnight but request permission online. Accessible with van & RV, just drive carefully watch for the roots and stone. Wonderful place at the back of the cliff with a beautiful view of the sea. Quiet place with the possibility of walking or cycling.

title: (35280) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 32 Calle Tomás Arroyo Cardoso
title_short: (35280) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 32 Calle Tomás Arroyo Cardoso
description: Great little town in the mountains. Highly Recommended.

description: Clean, fairly cheap and efficient laundry service. Very efficient dryer, also detergent included.

title: (35329) Vega de San Mateo - 134 GC-134
description: The highest parking lot of the island. Super crowded during the day time. We spend a night here with some other cars but would not recommend it longer than a dark hours. Use it only for a quick stop.

title: (35411) Arucas - 14 Paseo Hoya de Ariñez
description: Very quiet day and night parking, there are always many parking spaces. It is a very quiet park.

title: (35280) Las Lagunas - GC-550
description: Large gravel parking lot right next to the sports field. There is also a picnic area with tables and grills across the street. Quiet at night and good to spend the night.

title: (35329) Hoya del Gamonal -
description: We discovered the place by accident. It is very easy to drive on from the road and is surrounded by pine trees. The flowers and the view down the valley blew us away in the evening. In the morning we got up early to see the sunrise. Just a dream! Just 4 minutes by car from the Pico de las Nieves viewpoint. The only hack was the temperature as it cooled down to 3 degrees there at night.

title: (35349) Valleseco - 1 Lugar la Laguna
description: Laguna recreational area parking. Level esplanade with space for several ACs. Both the area and the parking lot are open all night. In the morning the roosters wake you up. No traffic at night and few cars after 08:00

title: (35118) Agüimes - 79 Calle las Casuarinas

title: (35118) Arinaga - Calle Guelde

title: (35118) Arinaga - 98 Avenida Polizón

title: (35411) Arucas - 1 Alonso Quijano

description: Motorhome and furgoscamper area (Corral De Los Juncos - Top of Gran Canaria).

title: (35280) La Sorrueda -
description: Ample parking with a nice 15 minute walk around the sight. There are bushes nearby. You can hear bugs online and a little way further. Officially, it is forbidden to sleep. There is a berrier that was open.

title: (35431) Firgas - 2 Caserio Barranquillos
description: It is a place in the shade between eucalyptus trees that is relatively flat. Great for overnight parking and being in the shade. It smells wonderful and is very quiet, as almost no cars pass by at night.

name: Playa Bahía de Formas
title: (35119) Playa Bahía de Formas
description: When there is no wind, this is a great spot for a quiet night.  It's a popular spot during the day for windsurfing but at night there may be one or two other vans but no-one else.  Dogs are tolerated on the beach.

title: (35001) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - s/n Avenida de las Petrolíferas
title_short: (35001) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - s/n Avenida de las Petrolíferas
description: Disa gas station. Water after odor and taste test, as expected, unfortunately not drinking water. But you can fill the tank. The BP is nearby. Water just as bad.

title: (35280) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 33 Lugar el Lomito
title_short: (35280) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 33 Lugar el Lomito
description: Parking completely alone in the beautiful nature! Access difficult but ok!

name: Zona de Acampada Bailico
title: (35369) Zona de Acampada Bailico
description: Very quiet area, ideal to relax and rest in the middle of nature surrounded by pine trees. ? The Environment Service offers eight camping areas to the public. They are delimited and signposted spaces in the natural environment for stays and overnight stays, in tents and/or caravans, depending on the infrastructure. In any case, to camp in the areas offered, as in any other, prior authorization is required. We distinguish between camping areas without services, more naturalized, and with minimal services of toilets, water, brick barbecues. ? Registering with username/password, for which you must register only once and go to the OIAC to validate your identity. Once you complete these steps, you will be able to make your online reservation through online application

title: (35290) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - 26 Calle Doctor Manuel Zenón Araña Yánez
title_short: (35290) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - 26 Calle Doctor Manuel Zenón Araña Yánez
description: Even cemented parking place facing the municipal park. Sinks and running water for free. Fantastic view of surrounding mountains.

address.street: 26 Calle Doctor Manuel Zenón Araña Yánez

title: (35369) Cruz de Tejeda - 3 Diseminado Cruz de Tejeda
title_short: (35369) Cruz de Tejeda - 3 Diseminado Cruz de Tejeda
description: Parking day and night. good views.no services, only restaurants and shops

title: (35009) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria -
description: Right on the beach. Around 5-20 campers each day. The photo is of further along after the main car park and beach decking area. Lots of people camp here. We did again recently. The no camping sign at the entrance I assume is for that bit of road, either that or absolutely everybody ignores it. Every local we spoke to about camping there said its a local favourite spot to camp.

title: (35110) Vecindario - 65 Calle Acusa
description: Self-Service Laundry

title: (35009) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - Carretera de las Coloradas
title_short: (35009) Las Palmas de Gran Canaria - Carretera de las Coloradas
description: Nice beach with ample parking. Only during the day. Police check at 9:00. Camping prohibited sign at the beginning of the road.

title: (35290) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - 2 GC-520
description: Very nice free parking in the mountains at GC-60. It is about 10 minutes from Fataga here. There is also a picnic area with tables and a barbecue.

title: (35369) Tejeda - GC-608
description: Parking La Culata Tejeda. Only suitable for small camper. No motorhomes or camper vans. Not recommended on weekends. Much noise from the first hour. Only overnight stays allowed. Without taking forward, chairs, etc. No camping. Spectacular view. The Roque Nublo right next door. Restaurants with very good and cheap typical food.

name: Finca de Isa
title: (35360) Finca de Isa
description: Hostel "Finca la Isa" with possibility of parking for caravans. The reception and the hostel with wifi are a 2-minute walk from the car park. The view is great, the area looks like a small farm and the atmosphere is positive. 2 p.m. to 4 p.m. is siesta. Water and electricity are not available in the parking lot.

title: (35369) La Culata - GC-600
description: Parking to walk to roque del Nublo. Parking is not level. Overnight recommended elsewhere in the area. Across the street is a small merchant.

title: (35280) El Sitio de Arriba -
description:
Camping Molino de Agua , Lugar en un entorno estupendo en medio de la montaña.
 TF: 660 94 65 25

title: (35430) Firgas - 6 Calle Molino
description: Free public parking in the heart of Villa de Firgas.

title: (35110) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 117 Calle de Franchi y Roca
title_short: (35110) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - 117 Calle de Franchi y Roca
description: Service area for motorhomes. Emptying of gray and black water tanks and refilling of clean water tank for €1 70 liters. Laundry and drying service, one of them exclusively for pet clothing. Pet washing area

title: (35430) Firgas - 1 Carretera las Madres
description: Public toilets next to the church and close to a playground. It has restrooms for men and women. Wheelchair accessible.

title: (35119) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - Avenida las Gaviotas
title_short: (35119) Santa Lucía de Tirajana - Avenida las Gaviotas
description: Nice gravel place. Directly at the sea. A few minutes' walk to the town and the pebble beach

title: (35108) Fataga - 1D Calle San Juan Bautista
description: Toilets behind the church

title: (35100) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - 17 Calle las Tabaibas
title_short: (35100) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - 17 Calle las Tabaibas
description: Nice little place in the Palmental. We slept peacefully. Mostly only occupied by day tourists. Parking lot closed at night, no entry and exit possible. On request we were able to get some water in the restaurant next door. Food was good there.

title: (35360) Tejeda - 12 GC-60
description: Free parking near the center of Tejeda. Very quiet to spend the night. Input a little complicated but suitable for AC up to 6 meters

title: (35360) Tejeda - 31 Calle Doctor Domingo Hernández Guerra
title_short: (35360) Tejeda - 31 Calle Doctor Domingo Hernández Guerra
description: Dirt parking in the lower part of the parking lot paving next to the cemetery there is a restaurant, supermarket and gas station in the town. Flat.

title: (35413) Arucas - 16 Pasaje Marconi
description: Large parking space below the motorway (you can't hear the noise) with the sound of the sea to fall asleep. No service, lights from the motorway above, unfortunately people sometimes leave their rubbish here. Few anglers are out here during the day. Access by Google Maps misleading, turn right immediately after the pedestrian bridge. Way a little adventurous, with Van it wasn't a problem.

title: (35421) Moya - 16 GC-704
description: Small parking bay in the middle of nature. We stood here one night with no problems. Located directly on a road with little traffic. Perfect starting point for hikes.

title: (35119) Pozo Izquierdo - 75 Avenida las Bajas
description: Parking directly at the windsurfing beach of Pozo. Nothing special but very relaxed and convenient for surfers. Public showers on the beach

name: Finca La Suerte
title: (35431) Finca La Suerte
description: Incredible view of the ocean. Limited number of guests. Campers up to 6.5m long allowed. Big kitchen, normal hot shower, art park around, animals.

title: (35420) Moya - 6 Calle Pico Lomito
description: Parking for all vehicles along the cemetery. Shaded, very quiet. It allows the walking tour of the church, museum and center. Supermarket at 200m. Our 6.49m motorhome could be parked on the cob.

title: (35413) Arucas - 35 Paseo Maritimos los C
description: Parking on land, no services, near natural pools and beach restaurants, promenade, not taking out camping elements, regularly passing municipal police, saturated in high season.

title: (35414) El Puertillo - 13 Plaza Santa Lucía
description: Toilets and cold showers (2 in the women's) . Open until 8pm I believe.

title: (35299) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - GC-604
description: Huge  parking space for staying some time with a beautiful view. Not great (near bye the Street) but it will get you through the night. The Roque Noblu is 5min from here.

title: (35108) Arteara - GC602
description: Location in the dry riverbed. Very quiet with a magnificent view and beautiful hikes to do. The track continues and drops back down to Maspalomas so there are plenty of pitches all along the track for several miles if you want to go further.

title: (35368) El Juncal - GC-605
description: Small field next to the road. Quiet zone

title: (35468) Gáldar - GC-220
description: Beautiful spot on a small hill.

title: (35414) Moya - 85 Calle el Altillo
description: Good place to be during the day, the Pepe Chiringo restaurant is not recommended.

title: (35414) Las Palmas, - Km 13 Cr Gral Del Norte
title_short: (35414) Las Palmas, - Km 13 Cr Gral Del Norte
description: Parking, do not take out chairs or awning.

title: (35299) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - GC-604
description: Recreation area 300m of dirt road, has toilets, water and tables

title: (35368) El Juncal - GC-605
description: Just a small pull in spot along the road. Enough space to fit 3 Campers. Beautiful views and very quiet.

title: (35457) Guía - 10 Calle la Sillailla
description: Next to the House of Cheese, with tables and public toilets

title: (35413) Moya - 12 Calle el Roque
description: Parking with large esplanade of land. It looks quiet but don't expect more than a place to spend the night.

title: (35468) Juncalillo -
description: Super quiet place to spend the day.

title: (35368) El Espinillo - 21 Barrio el Espinillo
description: Fantastic vantage point with no traffic. Is on a small hill so might need some momentum.

title: (35414) -
description: It is an area for motorhomes and caravans well located in the San Felipe area, called "Parking Finca Costa Lairaga", you will have a large plot where you can deploy the awning, tables, chairs , etc...

title: (35350) Artenara - 2 Calle de la Cuevita
description: Public toilets well maintained and clean. No shower.

title: (35350) Artenara - 38 GC-21
description: Unlimited parking, place to spend the night and rest, preferable during the week, on Sundays there are usually many people

title: (35350) Artenara - 13 Urbanización la Atalaya
description: A small area of trees, with a huge square above, and a good starting point to visit the town.

title: (35414) Moya - 6 Camino San Lorenzo
description: Former equipped area. gravel floor. full service. very close to the sea. very popular with surfers. nearby bar and restaurant. shower and bar services

title: (35350) Artenara - 2 Calle Camino de La Cilla
title_short: (35350) Artenara - 2 Calle Camino de La Cilla
description: Parking on the turn. It is big enough for van and small motorhomes. There is a trashbin and no sign to limit the parking time. Not flat

title: (35107) Castillo del Romeral - 1 Calle Bichero
description: Street where to park in one direction, quiet area, with some wind. pools and beach areas nearby. supermarket 10min walking, which even opens on Sundays until 3.

title: (35107) Castillo del Romeral - 2 Calle Maestro Jose Mo
title_short: (35107) Castillo del Romeral - 2 Calle Maestro Jose Mo
description: Perfect little place in Castillo de Romeral. It's a dirt parking lot, a bit flat. There is a natural swimming pool right next to the parking lot and many restaurants nearby. There is also space in the street adjacent to this location, if you prefer to park on asphalt.

title: (35350) Artenara - 16 CI-17-5
description: Nice place for night and day. Wonderful trips in the region by bike and Artenara is a beautiful city with a museum of apartments in really wonderful caves.

title: (35414) Guía - 66 Diseminado San Felipe
description: Parking in land facing the sea and near some houses. Quiet, no service. There is a camping area not very far but it does not seem always open: (28.143978, -15.578507)

title: (35299) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - GC-604
description: Good reachable place directly next to the lake. Flat surface for about 4 campers. Even if it's right next to the street it's really calm. No service. Sadly it's forbidden to swim in the lake.. The villagers seem really nice :) Let's keep this place tidy!

title: (35414) Guía - 85 Lugar Diseminado el Gallego
description: Remote residential area, beautiful viewpoint, no parking restriction signs. Not suitable for large motor homes.

title: (35109) - 33 Lugar Ayagaures
description: Nice spot at the edge of an artificial lake with greenery and beautiful cliffs. it is calm and flat. dirt track to access it but cars and even a heavy goods vehicle passed. So ok for up to Ducato type vans without problem and even camper vans for the more adventurous. rooster and donkey noise in the morning, nice! beautiful walks possible.

title: (35109) Ayagaures - Unnamed Road
description: Flat and very quiet corner next to a small unused service room. The view is superb, in the middle of the mountains with the lake below. Deserted place where you will not be disturbed!

title: (35299) Lomo de la Palma -
description: Follow the gravel road and a little further on there is space for around 20 vans, super quiet at night and day

title: (35107) Tarajalillo - GC-500
description: Good place .

title: (35350) Artenara - 30 Barrio las Hoyas
description: Peace at the end pf the road. Great view at the 2 valley. The access road is narrow but paved. Only recommended for motor homes less than 7 m.

title: (35489) Agaete - GC-231
description: Small space for a single vehicle with a nearby viewpoint and on the slopes of Tamadaba. Ideal to spend a night and continue to a bath in the beaches of Agaete or to start the rural path towards the Hornillo cave houses

title: (35350) Artenara - 39 Lugar Barrio Lugarejos
description: Quiet, lighted parking lot overlooking the reservoir. The access road is tarred but relatively narrow and winding. Our bus was fine.

name: Degollada de La Yegua
title: (35107) Degollada de La Yegua
description: Small car park (8 spaces) next to a viewpoint. Explanations of the stars. Close to the road but quiet at night.

name: Presa de Las Cuevas de Las Niñas
title: (35368) Presa de Las Cuevas de Las Niñas
title_short: (35368) Presa de Las Cuevas de Las Niñas
description: Free parking possible with supplies, picnic tables, camping areas, as well as a private area for motorhomes, a 1-minute main road, 24-hour bathrooms, and all services for the motorhome

title: (35299) San Bartolomé de Tirajana - GC-604
description: SOMEWHERE IN THE NATIONWAY

title: (35350) Las Hoyas - GC 216
description: Best hiking trail to get to know the green side of Gran Canaria from above! Quiet and awesome view.

title: (35350) Acusa Verde - 6 Lugar Diseminado Vega de Acusa
title_short: (35350) Acusa Verde - 6 Lugar Diseminado Vega de Acusa
description: Parking at the church La Candelaria

title: (35109) Ayagaures - Unnamed Road
description: Very very quiet spot, in the middle of nature with a superb view of the mountains, accessible from a track coming from Maspalomas. A word of advice: Don't take the track the other way, it's very chaotic.

title: (35128) Soria - GC 505
description: Quiet and isolated area. Starting point for trails that run near the Soria dam.

title: (35107) Bahía Feliz - Avda.Windsurfing
description: Car parks that are usually free and flat. walking a few minutes from the happy bay beach. very calm.

title: (35350) Acusa Verde - Unnamed Road
description: Place to spend the night

title: (35450) Guía - 2 C Alcade Oscar Bautista Afonso
title_short: (35450) Guía - 2 C Alcade Oscar Bautista Afonso
description: Speed Queen lavanderia

name: Área recreativa Tamadaba
title: (35489) Área recreativa Tamadaba
description: Wicker Plains. Camping area managed by the Cabildo de Gran Canaria. You must request permission to access on the website provided. With electronic certificate and if there are places, on the same day. There are toilets but no showers. Black water discharge and a point to wash slab. Cecopin Telephone 928 219 229. Earthen soil and needles and unrestricted and irregular plots. Access to the camping area is in poor condition, but they access AC

title: (35489) Agaete - 1 Lugar Tamadaba
description: A fairly well leveled area, between rocks and earth, where several vans can park. 2 houses are nearby but these are not their gardens. A very quiet place in the pine forest but cool and humid in winter.

title: (35128) Barranquillo Andrés -
description: Just a small parking with a nice view.

title: (35468) Gáldar - 36 Урбанисасьон Сау-Сан Исидро Индустр
description: Water supply near the town of Galdar ... and very attractive fuel prices. Close to a Lidl and a Superdino.

title: (35488) Gáldar - 134 Carretera General
description: Parking near the Three Eyes Bridge. It's pretty flat but small. Space for about 50 cars. There is a place de recrea that is open during the day with a playground, running water, barbecue areas and stone tables and benches. In about 10 minutes walking distance is the very cheap Speed Queen washing machine self service.
